description: Styles for the interactive Tic Tac Toe game frontend, defining the visual appearance and layout of various elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application, centers its children elements.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Displays the current status of the game.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Defines the grid layout for the Tic Tac Toe board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Individual cells of the Tic Tac Toe board, changes styles on hover.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Button to reset the game, styled for user interaction.
